businessRequirementsDocument.title: BRD for Ecommerce Platform
businessRequirementsDocument.executiveSummary: The Ecommerce Platform project aims to develop a comprehensive, enterprise-grade digital commerce solution that leverages industry-leading technologies and best practices to deliver exceptional user experiences and drive business growth. The platform will feature AI-powered personalization, mobile-first responsive design, omnichannel fulfillment capabilities including BOPIS, and a frictionless checkout process to compete with market leaders like Shopify and Amazon. With a focus on scalability, security, and compliance with GDPR, CCPA, and PCI DSS standards, the platform will serve both guest users and registered customers across web and mobile channels. Key success metrics include achieving a 35% conversion rate, reducing cart abandonment to below 20%, and increasing Average Order Value (AOV) by 25% through personalized recommendations and cross-selling features. The strategic importance lies in establishing a competitive digital presence that can adapt to evolving market trends including headless commerce, social commerce integration, and progressive web app capabilities.

businessObjectives.primaryObjectives: Launch a fully functional ecommerce platform within 9 months that achieves 35% conversion rate, supports 100,000+ concurrent users, processes $10M in annual revenue, and integrates with existing ERP and CRM systems. Implement AI-powered personalization to increase customer retention by 30% and achieve 99.9% uptime with sub-2-second page load times.

stakeholder.name: Chief Technology Officer
stakeholder.responsibilities: Overall technology strategy, budget approval, vendor selection, and ensuring technical alignment with business goals
stakeholder.requirements: Scalable architecture, security compliance, integration capabilities, and performance metrics
stakeholder.communicationPlan: Weekly executive updates, monthly steering committee presentations, quarterly strategic reviews

stakeholder.name: Product Manager
stakeholder.responsibilities: Defining product requirements, prioritizing features, managing product roadmap, and coordinating between business and development teams
stakeholder.requirements: User-centric design, competitive feature set, measurable business outcomes, and agile delivery
stakeholder.communicationPlan: Daily standups, weekly sprint reviews, bi-weekly stakeholder demos, monthly product roadmap updates

stakeholder.name: Marketing Director

stakeholder.requirements: SEO-friendly URLs, schema markup, promotional code capabilities, and analytics integration
stakeholder.communicationPlan: Weekly campaign planning, monthly performance reviews, quarterly strategy alignment

stakeholder.name: Customer Support Manager

stakeholder.communicationPlan: Bi-weekly operational meetings, monthly support metrics review, quarterly process improvement workshops

stakeholder.name: Legal Counsel

rule.name: Product Pricing Rule
rule.description: Product prices must include applicable taxes and display currency based on user's geographic location
rule.rationale: Ensures pricing transparency and compliance with local tax regulations
rule.impact: Affects product display pages, cart calculations, and checkout process
rule.exceptions: B2B customers with tax-exempt status may see pre-tax prices with proper documentation

rule.name: Inventory Management Rule
rule.description: Real-time inventory must be displayed and prevent overselling of products
rule.rationale: Prevents customer disappointment and maintains operational efficiency
rule.impact: Affects product availability, checkout process, and order fulfillment
rule.exceptions: Pre-orders and backorders may be allowed for specific products with clear communication

rule.name: Return Policy Rule
rule.description: Standard returns must be accepted within 30 days of delivery in original condition
rule.rationale: Aligns with consumer protection laws and competitive practices Affects customer satisfaction, reverse logistics, and financial planning Final sale items, personalized products, and perishable goods may have different return policies

rule.name: Data Privacy Rule
rule.description: Customer data must be encrypted at rest and in transit, with explicit consent for marketing communications
rule.rationale: Ensures GDPR and CCPA compliance while building customer trust
rule.impact: Affects all customer data handling, marketing automation, and account management
rule.exceptions: Essential transactional emails (order confirmations, shipping updates) do not require explicit consent

rule.name: Payment Security Rule
rule.description: All payment processing must be PCI DSS compliant with tokenization for stored payment methods
rule.rationale: Mandatory for handling credit card data and preventing financial fraud
rule.impact: Affects checkout process, payment gateway integration, and customer account security
rule.exceptions: None - this rule has no exceptions as it's a regulatory requirement

process.name: Product Discovery and Search
process.description: End-to-end process for users discovering products through browsing, searching, and AI recommendations
process.objectives: Enable users to find relevant products quickly and efficiently, increasing engagement and conversion

steps.step: User accesses platform homepage with AI-powered personalized recommendations
System displays trending products and categories based on user behavior
User utilizes search bar with real-time autocomplete suggestions
System applies AI algorithms to rank search results by relevance
User applies filters to refine search results dynamically
System updates product grid with filtered results maintaining SEO-friendly URLs
User navigates to product details page for selected items

process.inputs: User search queries, browsing history, demographic data, product catalog data
process.outputs: Personalized product recommendations, search results, filtered product listings
process.stakeholders: Guest Users, Registered Customers, Marketing Team, Product Managers

process.name: Checkout and Payment Processing
process.description: Streamlined checkout process supporting guest checkout, multiple payment methods, and order confirmation
process.objectives: Minimize cart abandonment while ensuring secure payment processing and order accuracy

steps.step: User initiates checkout from shopping cart
System presents single-page checkout with guest/login options
User enters or selects shipping information
System displays shipping options with costs and delivery estimates
User selects shipping method and enters payment information
System validates payment details and processes transaction via PCI DSS gateway
User confirms order and receives order confirmation
System sends confirmation email and updates order status

process.inputs: Shopping cart data, customer information, payment details, shipping preferences
process.outputs: Confirmed orders, payment authorizations, order confirmations, shipping notifications
process.stakeholders: Customers, Finance Team, Fulfillment Team, Payment Processors

process.name: Order Fulfillment and Tracking
process.description: Process for fulfilling orders, managing inventory, and providing customers with real-time tracking
process.objectives: Ensure accurate and timely order fulfillment while maintaining customer visibility

steps.step: System receives confirmed order and reserves inventory
Warehouse team picks and packs items based on order details
System generates shipping label and tracking number
Order is shipped and tracking information is updated
Customer receives shipping notification with tracking details
System monitors delivery status and updates order completion

process.inputs: Confirmed orders, inventory levels, shipping addresses, carrier information
process.outputs: Shipped orders, tracking numbers, delivery confirmations, inventory updates
process.stakeholders: Warehouse Staff, Fulfillment Managers, Customers, Shipping Carriers

dataEntity.name: Product
dataEntity.description: Core product entity containing all product information and attributes

attribute.name: sku
attribute.description: Stock Keeping Unit for inventory management

attribute.name: images
attribute.description: Array of product image URLs and metadata

dataEntity.relationships: Many-to-one with Category, one-to-many with Order Items, many-to-many with Tags
dataEntity.businessRules: Price must be greater than zero, inventory cannot be negative, at least one image required

dataEntity.name: Customer
dataEntity.description: Customer entity containing personal information and preferences

attribute.name: email
attribute.description: Customer email address for login and communications

dataEntity.relationships: One-to-many with Orders, one-to-many with Addresses, many-to-many with Wishlists
dataEntity.businessRules: Email must be unique, password must meet security requirements, marketing consent required for promotional emails

dataEntity.name: Order
dataEntity.description: Order entity containing transaction details and fulfillment information

attribute.name: customer_id
attribute.description: Reference to customer (null for guest orders)

attribute.name: order_date
attribute.description: Date and time when order was placed

attribute.name: status
attribute.description: Order status (pending, confirmed, shipped, delivered, cancelled, returned)

attribute.name: total_amount
attribute.description: Total order amount including tax and shipping

dataEntity.relationships: Many-to-one with Customer, one-to-many with Order Items, one-to-one with Payment
dataEntity.businessRules: Total amount must equal sum of items plus tax and shipping, status transitions must follow business rules

integration.name: Payment Gateway Integration
integration.description: Integration with PCI DSS compliant payment processor for secure payment processing
integration.system: Payment Gateway Provider (e.g., Stripe, PayPal, Adyen)
integration.purpose: Process credit card payments, digital wallets, and alternative payment methods securely
integration.dataExchange: Payment tokens, transaction amounts, customer billing information, payment confirmations
integration.security: PCI DSS compliance, end-to-end encryption, tokenization of card data

integration.name: Shipping Carrier Integration
integration.description: Integration with major shipping carriers for rate calculation and label generation
integration.system: Shipping Carriers (e.g., UPS, FedEx, USPS, DHL)
integration.purpose: Calculate shipping rates, generate shipping labels, provide tracking information
integration.dataExchange: Package dimensions, weight, origin/destination addresses, tracking numbers
integration.frequency: Real-time for rate calculation, batch for label generation
integration.security: API authentication, encrypted data transmission, rate limiting

integration.name: Inventory Management System
integration.description: Integration with ERP or inventory management system for real-time inventory synchronization
integration.purpose: Synchronize inventory levels, prevent overselling, update stock levels
integration.dataExchange: Product SKUs, inventory counts, reservation status, stock updates
integration.frequency: Real-time updates, batch reconciliation every 15 minutes
integration.security: API key authentication, data validation, error handling

integration.name: Email Service Provider
integration.description: Integration with email service for transactional and marketing communications
integration.purpose: Send order confirmations, shipping notifications, marketing emails
integration.dataExchange: Customer email addresses, order details, tracking information, promotional content
integration.frequency: Real-time for transactional emails, scheduled for marketing campaigns
integration.security: SMTP authentication, unsubscribe management, CAN-SPAM compliance

integration.name: Analytics Platform
integration.description: Integration with web analytics for tracking user behavior and conversion metrics
integration.system: Analytics Platform (e.g., Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics)
integration.purpose: Track user journeys, conversion rates, revenue attribution, A/B testing
integration.dataExchange: Page views, events, user sessions, conversion data, revenue information
integration.frequency: Real-time event tracking, batch data processing for reporting
integration.security: Data anonymization, GDPR compliance, cookie consent management

requirement.name: GDPR Compliance
requirement.description: Implementation of GDPR requirements for EU customers including data protection, consent management, and data portability
requirement.impact: Affects customer data collection, storage, processing, and deletion procedures
requirement.implementation: Implement consent management platform, data access/deletion APIs, privacy policy updates, cookie consent banner

requirement.name: CCPA Compliance
requirement.description: Compliance with California Consumer Privacy Act for California residents
requirement.impact: Requires transparency in data collection, opt-out mechanisms, and data deletion rights
requirement.implementation: Add "Do Not Sell My Personal Information" link, implement data request processing, update privacy policy

requirement.name: PCI DSS Compliance
requirement.description: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard compliance for handling credit card data
requirement.impact: Affects payment processing, card data storage, network security, and access controls
requirement.implementation: Use tokenization, implement secure payment gateway, regular security assessments, encryption of sensitive data

requirement.name: WCAG 2.1 Accessibility
requirement.description: Web Content Accessibility Guidelines compliance for inclusive design
requirement.regulation: WCAG 2.1 AA Level, Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA)
requirement.impact: Affects website design, content structure, and user interface elements
requirement.implementation: Implement semantic HTML, ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, color contrast compliance, screen reader support

requirement.name: Consumer Protection Laws
requirement.description: Compliance with consumer protection regulations regarding returns, refunds, and disclosures
requirement.regulation: Federal Trade Commission (FTC) regulations, state consumer protection laws
requirement.impact: Affects return policies, pricing transparency, terms of service, and advertising practices
requirement.implementation: Clear return policy disclosure, transparent pricing, accurate product descriptions, fair advertising practices

criterion.name: Conversion Rate Achievement
criterion.description: Achieve 35% conversion rate from product page to purchase
criterion.measurement: Track conversion rate through analytics platform, compare against industry benchmark of 2-3%
criterion.target: 35% conversion rate within 6 months of launch

criterion.name: Cart Abandonment Reduction
criterion.description: Reduce shopping cart abandonment rate to below 20%
criterion.measurement: Monitor cart abandonment through funnel analysis in analytics platform
criterion.target: Less than 20% abandonment rate within 3 months of launch

criterion.name: Performance Standards
criterion.description: Achieve sub-2-second page load times and 99.9% uptime
criterion.measurement: Monitor performance through APM tools, conduct regular load testing
criterion.target: 99.9% uptime, <2 second load time for 95% of pages

criterion.name: Customer Satisfaction
criterion.measurement: Collect post-purchase surveys, monitor NPS scores, track customer reviews
criterion.target: 4.5/5 average rating across all customer feedback channels

criterion.name: Revenue Growth
criterion.description: Generate $10M in annual revenue through the platform
criterion.measurement: Track total revenue through financial reporting and platform analytics
criterion.target: $10M annual revenue within first 12 months of operation
